document_data.Description: The ''Outlander'' appeared to be a crude wooden bow, carved with magical sigils that glowed with eerie green radiance.
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Saarvin and the outlander.jpg|thumb|''Saarvin and his enchanted bow.'']]
When the ''Outlander'' was used to shoot, the bow's magic could summon additional [[arrow]]s and send them towards the wielder's enemies. These ensorcelled arrows took aim at random targets, never sending more that one arrow per target.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Saarvin]]: a [[dragonborn]] [[ranger]] adventurer who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
